Google Pixel 3a Highlights

The expected price of Google Pixel 3a is BDT 34,990. Google Pixel 3aX smartphone comes with 5.6 inches, 79.6 cm2 (~75.0% screen-to-body ratio), OLED capacitive touchscreen display and resolution 1080 x 2220 pixels, 18.5:9 ratio ~441 PPI density. Pixel 3a performing Octa-core (2×2.0 GHz 360 Gold & 6×1.7 GHz Kryo 360 Silver), Qualcomm SDM670 Snapdragon 670 (10 nm)  processor. It has 4 GB of RAM and 64 GB internal storage, which can not be expended external storage. This stylish device has a 12.2 MP in the back and an 8 MP camera on the front side. It was powered by a standard 3000 mAh Li-polymer battery.
